price: 24. Isagaa (Alle) leh doonyaha dhex maaxa4 badda ee buuraha la moodo.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ
footnotes: 4. Haddii loo akhriyo munshi’aatu markaas macnuhu wuxuu noqon ka muuqda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
